1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | This module provides a container for tokens.
4--   No tokens in Koshucode are in a extent of multiple lines.
5--   'CodeLine' includes whole tokens in a line.
6--   You can represent tokenized source code
7--   as a list of 'CodeLine'.
8
9module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Code.Clause
10  ( -- * CodeClause
11    CodeClause (..),
12    codeClauseEmpty,  
13    splitClause,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO              as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List            as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude         as B
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Code.Line       as B
20
21
22-- ----------------------  CodeClause
23
24-- | Tokens in clause.
25data CodeClause a = CodeClause
26    { clauseLines     :: [B.CodeLine a]  -- ^ Source lines of clause
27    , clauseTokens    :: [a]             -- ^ Source tokens of clause
28    } deriving (Show)
29
30instance (B.GetCodePos a) => B.GetCodePos (CodeClause a) where
31    getCPs (CodeClause _ ts) = B.getCPs $ head ts
32
33-- | Clause with no tokens.
34codeClauseEmpty :: CodeClause a
35codeClauseEmpty = CodeClause [] []
36
37-- | Split lines into clause based on indent size.
38--
39--   >>> splitClause [(0, "a"), (2, "b"), (0, "c"), (1, "d")]
40--   (["a","b"], [(0,"c"),(1,"d")])
41--
42splitClause :: B.Gather [(B.IndentSize, a)] [a]
43splitClause = first where
44    first    ((i, x) : xs)            = B.consFst x $ continue i xs
45    first    []                       = ([], [])
46    continue i ((n, x) : xs) | n > i  = B.consFst x $ continue i xs
47    continue _ xs                     = ([], xs)
48
